===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# The {{w|century of humiliation}}, the period of Chinese history between 1839 and 1949 during which Western powers and Japan intervened with China. 1839 refers to the {{w|First Opium War}}, and 1949 refers to the establishment of the [[People's Republic of China]].
